ranks.effect: 16% (total) damage to guards. All Guard Killer bonuses now also affect enemy lords and supervisors.
20% (total) damage to guards, lords, and supervisors. Gain 50% of your endurance back after killing guards, lords, and supervisors.

name: Defense Against Guards
description: Reduces the damage you take from enemy guards

ranks.effect: 16% reduced damage (total) from guards. All Defense Against Guards bonuses apply to lords and supervisors.
20% reduced damage (total) from guards, lords, and supervisors. Gain retaliation for 10 seconds when you take damage from guards, lords, or supervisors. This effect triggers once every 20 seconds.

name: Mercenary's Bane
description: Increases damage to and reduces damage from mercenaries
